comment: Hytale Hybrid Egg by Gemini. Supports x86_64 and ARM64 (Oracle Ampere) natively.
name: Hytale Hybrid
description: A robust Hytale server egg with architecture-aware downloading via Box64 for ARM nodes.

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The UDP port for the Hytale server (QUIC protocol).

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: Memory allocation for the Java process.
